entry.title: c#字符串操作
entry.content: String s1=” ab cde “; String s2; String s3=””; String s4=String.empty; int len=s1.length; s2=s1.trim(); s2=s1.Indexof(‘a’); s2=s1.Insert(0,”xx”); s2=s1.remove(0,2)； s2=s1.Replace(‘a’,’b’); String[] tmp=s1.Split(‘ ‘); s2=s1.Substring(0,4); s2=String.Format(“name:{0},sex:{1}”,2,3);
